    Price per user/per year$19.90$49

    Order a basic subscription Order a standard subscription Get a quotation

    The order buttons are for payment by credit-card, if you want to pay by bank transfer instead of credit-card please get a quotation first.

    For educational institutions there is a 50% education discount available, please get a quotation and indicate your preferred payment method (credit-card or bank transfer).

    If you want to send a purchase order please get a quotation first.

    Subscriptions are available per pack of 20 users for the basic subscription and per pack of 100 users for the standard subscription. A user is defined as an individual authorized by you to use an on-premise GitLab server. The subscription will renew automatically.

    24/7 support available from March 1st 2014.
